si.title: ජනාධිපතිවරයා සහ නාට්යය සහ දේශපාලනය
body_lines: President Ranil's speech in the speech of the people, even if politics is not spoken or not voting- indirectly listening to the people ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

en.title: The president and the drama and the politics
body_lines: President Ranil's speech in the speech of the people, even if politics is not spoken or not voting- indirectly listening to the people ,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

summary_lines: In President Ranil's address, he subtly addressed political issues without directly mentioning them, indirectly listening to public sentiment through his speech.
